awd_titl_txt: Geometrical/Topological Lattice Structure of Protocol Models
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator (PI) proposes to study the                      algebraic topological structure of the state transition lattice                 (diagram) of models used for representing protocols of                          communication and computation systems.  He will emphasize                       queueing and Petri network protocol models.                                          The research program will involve a study of lattice                       topological structure, product and non-product form networks,                   protocol synthesis, protocol resource contention, and the                       relation between lattice structure and network traffic processes.               Potential applications include the performance evaluation of                    communication, computation, and management systems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
